net.adamcin.oakpal.api

Class SimpleProgressCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.api.SimpleProgressCheck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProgressCheck, ScanListener, ViolationReporter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleProgressCheckFactoryCheck

    @ConsumerType
public class SimpleProgressCheck
extends Object
implements ProgressCheck
    Simple implementation of a ProgressCheck with convenient methods for reporting and collecting violations.

        public void setResourceBundle(ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Description copied from interface: ViolationReporter

        Parameters:

      • getResourceBundle

        @Nullable
protected @Nullable ResourceBundle getResourceBundle()
                                                        throws MissingResourceException
        Used by getString(String) to retrieve localized messages. NOTE: If this method is called before a non-null ResourceBundle has been injected via ViolationReporter.setResourceBundle(ResourceBundle), it will try to get a fallback ResourceBundle by calling ResourceBundle.getBundle(String), which invokes the default classloader and locale behavior, using ViolationReporter.getResourceBundleBaseName() as the resource bundle base name.
        Returns:
        the resource bundle
        Throws:
        MissingResourceException
        See Also:
        ResourceBundle.getBundle(String), ViolationReporter.getResourceBundleBaseName()

      • getString

        @NotNull
protected @NotNull String getString(@NotNull
                                             @NotNull String key)
        Lookup a localized string from the resource bundle.
        Parameters:
        key - the i18n key
        Returns:
        the localized string
        Throws:
        MissingResourceException - if an attempt is made to load a missing ResourceBundle
